body.p: The Fellowship of the FSFE Berlin is going to have another evening of Free Software Love on Thursday, 11 October 2012. This time, we'll be hosted by LinuxWorks! Friedrichshain at the E-Lok Jugendclub near Ostkreuz.

As always, location details can be found on the GriCal event page.
Please come and join, it's free for all and everyone is welcome!
